Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.cfg.NamingStrategy

Packages that use NamingStrategy
org.hibernate.cfg This package defines APIs for configuring Hibernate, and classes for building the Hibernate configuration-time metamodel. 
 

Uses of NamingStrategy in org.hibernate.cfg
 

Classes in org.hibernate.cfg that implement NamingStrategy
 class DefaultNamingStrategy
          The default NamingStrategy
 class ImprovedNamingStrategy
          An improved naming strategy that prefers embedded underscores to mixed case names
